summary: Completed significant portions of Beauty Booking module implementation. Phase 1 (Groundwork): Created BeautySalonPolicy, BeautyBookingPolicy, and BeautyReviewPolicy in app/Policies and registered in AuthServiceProvider. Enhanced seeder already exists. All services (10) are well-implemented with complete business logic. Phase 2 (Admin Web): Created comprehensive admin dashboard view with KPI cards, 3 charts (revenue breakdown pie, bookings over time line, top salons bar), and activity feeds. All admin controllers (12) and views exist. Phase 3 (Vendor Web): Vendor dashboard is complete with KPIs, charts, and recent bookings. All vendor controllers (13) and views exist. Vendor sidebar is comprehensive. Phase 4 (Customer Web): Customer routes, controllers, and views exist. Phase 5 (API Layer): API routes are comprehensive with rate limiting (throttle middleware) for all endpoints. Customer and vendor API routes are well-structured. Remaining work: Verify/complete customer web views implementation, ensure all API controllers match route definitions, Flutter app updates (Phase 6), comprehensive testing (Phase 7), and finalization (Phase 8).
current_status: Phase 1: 100% complete (policies created, services audited, seeder exists). Phase 2: 90% complete (dashboard done, other admin views exist and need verification). Phase 3: 90% complete (dashboard and sidebar done, other vendor views exist). Phase 4: 70% complete (routes/controllers exist, views need verification/completion). Phase 5: 85% complete (routes comprehensive with rate limiting, controllers need verification). Phase 6-8: Not started. Overall: ~75% of backend/web implementation complete. Infrastructure (entities, migrations, services, config) is solid. Focus needed on: customer web view completion, API controller verification, Flutter integration, testing, and final QA.
